titleStmt.title: The saints sufferings, and sinners sorrowes. Or, The evident tokens of the salvation of the one, and the perdition of the other Phil. I.28, 2 Thes. I.6,7
titleStmt.author: Yates, John, d. ca. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Cotes, for N. Bourne, dwelling in the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Some print faded and show-through; some pages stained.
Reproduction of original in Dr. Williams' Library.
